Articles.Content:
Firespitter Plugin, CrossFeedEnabler, KAS, MechJeb, Kerbal Engineer Redux, KW Rocketry. Please :C

Edited November 30, 2014 by Unknow0059

If they're up on GitHub, GitHub archives everything. There may or may not be a nice neat zipped archive, but the source code can still be compiled: you just have to roll back to the last pre-0.25 commit.

If they're up on GitHub, GitHub archives everything. There may or may not be a nice neat zipped archive, but the source code can still be compiled: you just have to roll back to the last pre-0.25 commit.

I know, but i think these mods aren't on github, not sure.

Firespitter, Crossfeed Enabler, KAS, MechJeb, KER are all on Git. KWR is on Kerbal Stuff, so you can download previous versions from there.

The current version of the Firespitter is for 0.24.2, although the standalone plugin download has been updated.
I didn't know i could download previous versions on the Kerbal Stuff, thank you very much!
